quote: Sometimes I feel like I'm a pawn in a chess game... being moved around by some invisible player.
If you want to see a miracle, son, be the miracle.
I'm not sure what four n***as with a fifth of vodka in 'em could possibly do to help you, sir.
You don't know what it is to be a cripple in Harlem. It's like being black twice.
Do you think you're the only one with a gun?
Don't you lecture me, you son of a b***h. I was there when you were still swimming in your daddy's balls!
I'm willing to offer you a deal. Do you want it or not?
You don't know me, son, so let me explain this to you once. If I ever kill you, you'll be awake. You'll be facing me. And you'll be armed.
If you pray for the rain, you gotta deal with the mud too.
